author: draganrakita
content:
> Keep the May 1st 2025 activation date for 7639
I dont think there is a need for activation of `eth/70` (EIP-7639) version. Client can start supporting it even today.  What it needs to be decided is when by default to drop `eip/68`, before that it make sense to add flag.

author: funnygiulio
content: I dont support the eth/70 either. Mostly because it is kind of useless as 1) you cannot enforce the protocol 2) No real benefits even if you could

author: pipermerriam
content:
I've highlighted the arguments for bumping the version here

https://notes.ethereum.org/M41Oj3WyRVSC36Rr0c-Tjg

There are benefits but it is ultimately up to the client teams to decide which path forward will be agreed upon. Let me know if there are other arguments that you would like to see captured in that document (either for or against)
